concept.title: Accessing Hashicorp Vault Information
concept.shortdesc: You can access information stored in Hashicorp Vault, such as user credentials, from the pipeline.

conbody.p: To access to Vault data, you must authenticate with Vault. After authentication, you can use expressions in the pipeline that access Vault at run time.
To securely handle Vault information, must use HTTPS.

To access information stored in Vault, perform the following steps:
Configure the Vault properties file.
Discover the ID.
Configure Vault to authenticate .
In the pipeline, use an expression to access Vault information.

p.note: This documentation includes details about Hashicorp Vault to simplify the installation and configuration process. For more information, see the Vault documentation.
